divs: sighting details1967 at night, i was plowing a field preparing it for rice planting. just me in a field totally dark, the field was approx. 75 acres. i saw a ring of lights white and red maybe 400 yards above slowly descending to the ground.i was driving a tractor and pulling a plow. i stopped the tractor and watched as the craft lowered and landed several hundred yards from me. it set for a time so i headed my tractor in its direction to see what it was. as i got closer i was able to get a better view. it had a triangular bubble top that was lit up. the bubble set atop a dark circular base with red and white lights circling the bottom. the whole thing looked about 30 to 40 feet in diameter. as i got closer there appeared very large visions of black leopard type cats, hissing and making growling screaming kind of noises, surounding the tractor. i stopped the tractor and thought about running, when suddenly the cats dissapeared. i felt something at my right side and looked, it was a small individual. on tractors of that size there are small seats on each of the drivers seat. we were both sitting but i estimate him to be 3 to 4 feet tall. he was wearing a grey suit with blue seams. the suit was not like latex but more like what we now have called bubble wrap. his skin was the color of a caucasion that had not seen the sun for quite some time. he was wearing grey gloves and high top grey fabric shoes.he had a helmut but that was taken off quickly. i dont know but i really wasnt that frightened actually kind of relaxed. he was talking and i couldnt understand anything, he produced a platinum object about 7 or 8 inches long and had the width and depth of a domino. etched on it about 1\4 inch apart were symbols and what looked like letters. he handed me the object and i could understand everey word he said. i dont know if i was speaking his language or mine but we were communicating. he told me that the huge cats were used often to approach subjects while they were confused. of course they were not real but the visions were. i have heard of many ufo sightings and encounters over the years, but never have i heard of any visions of animals. yet he told me that this trick was used often. he told me that a log was kept on everyone that had ever been visited including animals. he told me that he was only one of a hundred ships that were sent out by the mother ship, which he pointed out to me. during day time the mother ship was hidden in clouds and at night it was high enough in the sky to avoid detection. he pointed to red lights that were appearing and disappearing in the sky an said those were ships like his leaving and returning. he would not let me get close to his ship but he showed me several things. like a flash light that could go around an object and continue its beam on the objects other side like the object wasnt there. i was with him for 6 to 7 hours because when he left dawn was just breaking. he told me that all visitants would be visited again from time to time, including me, and i have been several times. all i know is that i have never been able to father a child. my teeth have thousands of small pin holes at the gum line which causes me to have them redone every 2 or 3 years. a military dentist asked me if i had ever undergone high doses of radiation or had special tests performed by the military. it has been many years and i have told no body eccept my wife. if you have interest please e mail me. i have alot more to tell.
